data.description_html:
As auspicious odds, except that this spell affects multiple targets and the duration is shorter.
If, on a single roll, all four die results are 1s, the spell immediately ends for that subject only, unless it's the caster, in which case it ends for everyone.
data.name: Auspicious Odds, Mass
data.target: One creature/three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
